DOC.brief_summary: Epidemiological study indicate regular consumption three cup black tea per day reduces risk stroke myocardial infarction . In number previous nutrition intervention study tea show improve vascular function assess Flow Mediated Dilation ( FMD ) .
DOC.detailed_description: The current study test specific Black tea extract placebo population previously show sensitive effect black tea Flow Mediated dilation . A tea extract previously show improve FMD include positive control .
DOC.criteria: Apparently healthy male volunteer history cardiovascular disease Having body mass index ( BMI ) 18.0 30.0 kg/m2 ( inclusive ) Nonsmokers ( > 2 year ) Nontea drinker ( less equal 1 cup/week ) Limited alcohol intake ( less equal 21 units/week ) Systolic blood pressure less equal 160 mmHg and/or diastolic blood pressure less equal 100 mmHg screen Brachial artery image use ultrasound screen FMD value within expect range judge PI Judged good health basis medical history , physical examination routine laboratory test ( total cholesterol , HDL cholesterol , LDL cholesterol , triglyceride , glucose , highly sensitive Creactive protein ) .
